mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_ID , A.RESERVE_ID , A.TITLE , A.PLAYTIME , A.AGE , A.MOVIE_START , A.RESERVE_TIME , A.RESERVE_TICKET , A.SELECTED_SEAT , A.SELECTED_THEATER , B.PAY_MONEY , B.PAY_DATE FROM RESERVATION A JOIN PAY B ON A.RESERVE_ID = B.RESERVE_ID WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY B.PAY_DATE DESC

SELECT MEMBER_ID , RESERVE_ID , TITLE , PLAYTIME , AGE , MOVIE_START , RESERVE_TIME , RESERVE_TICKET , SELECTED_SEAT , SELECTED_THEATER FROM RESERVATION WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY RESERVE_ID DESC
